hero.greeting: Hi, I'm Luis Felipe Tavera Orozco
hero.description: With over 8 years of experience building robust, scalable, and efficient software solutions. My passion is to transform complex ideas into intuitive and powerful applications using technologies like .Net, React, Angular, NodeJs and more.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I am a developer focused on quality and best practices. I firmly believe that good software should not only work but also be maintainable and scalable. That's why I apply design patterns, clean architectures, and SOLID principles in every project I lead or participate in. My goal is always to deliver real value through clean and well-structured code.
about.paragraph2: I consider myself a lifelong learner, always exploring new technologies and methodologies to improve my skills. I enjoy technical challenges and collaborating in dynamic teams to achieve common goals. Currently, I contribute my experience to the Flyr team, where I help develop innovative solutions.

items.description: Development and maintenance of critical applications for the aviation sector, using a modern tech stack based on .Net and React. I collaborate in defining architectures and implementing new features, ensuring system performance and scalability.

I participated in the development of software solutions for airlines, focusing on reservation and passenger management systems. I implemented complex integrations and worked on optimizing key business processes.
I contributed to the development of internal information systems for academic and administrative management, improving the efficiency of university processes through technology.
I was responsible for developing components and features for project management software products, working mainly with .Net technologies in an agile environment.

faceRecognitionApi.description: A RESTful API developed in .NET Core that integrates Microsoft Azure's facial recognition services. It allows managing, training, and recognizing faces through secure and efficient endpoints.

chromeExtension.description: A personal project to explore the power of Google Chrome APIs. This extension demonstrates how to interact with the browser's native features, such as tab management, storage, and notifications.

bankSimulator.description: A project as part of a programming contest to simulate banking operations.

portfolio.description: This very portfolio. A modern web application built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS for a fluid user experience and responsive design. Deployed with Firebase Hosting.

noPosts.title: Coming Soon!
noPosts.description: There are no posts available at the moment, but stay tuned for new content!

contact.title: Let's Talk
contact.description: I'm always open to connecting, collaborating on interesting projects, or exploring new professional opportunities. If you find my profile interesting, don't hesitate to contact me.
